      • transformTo

        public IMagnitude transformTo​(IMagnitude from,
                              IPhysicalUnit to)
                       throws UnknownUnitException
        Method that transforms a Magnitude into a magnitude of a different system.
        Specified by:
        transformTo in interface IMetricSystemConverter
        Parameters:
        from - IMagnitude that we want to transform.
        to - IPhysicalUnit in which we want our Magnitude to be at the end.
        Returns:
        mag IMagnitude.
        Throws:
        UnknownUnitException - if the metric systems do not have a converter or there is a Quantity Exception.
